title: The Digital Twin (Gazebo & Simulation)
description: Explore simulation environments and digital twin concepts using Gazebo for physics simulation, sensors, and environment interaction
learningOutcomes: Understand Gazebo simulation environment and physics engine
Create and configure simulation worlds with physics properties
Implement various sensor models (IMU, depth camera, LiDAR)
Design humanoid test scenes with proper physics interactions
Validate simulation results against real-world expectations
Integrate sensors with ROS 2 for perception and navigation
